argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idrnghm.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_id | |- ( R e. Rng -> R e. Rng ) |
| 3 | 2, 2 | #P_jca | |- ( R e. Rng -> ( R e. Rng /\ R e. Rng ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_rngabl | |- ( R e. Rng -> R e. Abel ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ablgrp | |- ( R e. Abel -> R e. Grp ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_idghm | |- ( R e. Grp -> ( _I |` B ) e. ( R GrpHom R ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_3syl | |- ( R e. Rng -> ( _I |` B ) e. ( R GrpHom R ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_rngmgp | |- ( R e. Rng -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. SGrp ) |
| 10 |  | #P_sgrpmgm | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) e. SGrp -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mgm ) |
| 11 | 8, 1 | #P_mgpbas | |- B = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_idmgmhm | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mgm -> ( _I |` B ) e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MgmHom ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 10, 12 | #P_3syl | |- ( R e. Rng -> ( _I |` B ) e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MgmHom ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) |
| 14 | 7, 13 | #P_jca | |- ( R e. Rng -> ( ( _I |` B ) e. ( R GrpHom R ) /\ ( _I |` B ) e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MgmHom ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 8 | #P_isrnghmmul | |- ( ( _I |` B ) e. ( R RngHomo R ) <-> ( ( R e. Rng /\ R e. Rng ) /\ ( ( _I |` B ) e. ( R GrpHom R ) /\ ( _I |` B ) e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MgmHom ( mulGrp ` R ) ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 3, 14, 15 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( R e. Rng -> ( _I |` B ) e. ( R RngHomo R ) ) |
